name: @bect/tanggalan
description: Pustaka lengkap untuk konversi Kalender Jawa.

scripts.build:pages: npm run build && mkdir -p pages/dist/preview/dist && cp dist/tanggalan.min.js pages/dist/ && cp pages/index.html pages/dist/index.html && cp pages/preview/index.html pages/dist/preview/index.html && esbuild pages/preview/js/app.js --bundle --minify --outfile=pages/dist/preview/dist/bundle.min.js && esbuild pages/preview/css/style.css --bundle --minify --outfile=pages/dist/preview/dist/style.min.css
scripts.test: node test/functional.js && node test/pasaran_validation.js && node test/kabisat.js && node test/get_gregorian.js && node test/date_difference.js && node test/next_weton.js
scripts.preview: npm run build:pages && npx serve pages/dist
